page.title: 20Commuting (continued)
page.content: but that's not all! The bad news for the morning is the newscaster announces there is an accident at junction 4 on the A3 along with a 100 yard pile up: the traffic is bound to be bad.You come to the end of your road and turn right. You pull out and put your foot down; 25,30,40,50,60 m.p.h. Oh no,the round- about! You slow down just as you were getting up speed. You carry straight to road junction 2. You rev up: 40,50,60 m.p.h. You carry on peacefully and you've caught up with time.Phew, that was close! You pass junction 3 you soon see the blue lights up ahead you gradually slow down and you grind to a halt. You sit in the traffic jam and then an hour after this you're in the city and outside the office.{
